quoteText: User agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Site Juleba for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential third-party claims, actions or suits, as well as any related expenses, liabilities, damages, settlements or fees arising from Users use of the Site or Sharing of Shortcuts, or a violation of any terms of this Agreement.
